pageTitle: Not eligible because of severe disability premium
h1: Based on your answers, you're not eligible for New Style ESA
p1: You cannot claim New Style ESA if you get or are entitled to the severe disability premium.

whatDoYouWantToDo.p1: You can keep claiming other benefits because you get or are entitled to the severe disability premium.
whatDoYouWantToDo.p2: Call one of the numbers below to make or continue a claim. When you call, tell them that you get or are entitled to the severe disability premium.

MakeOrContinueClaim.p1: Call 0800 169 0350 to make or continue a claim for:
MakeOrContinueClaim.p2: To make or continue a Housing Benefit claim, contact your local authority.
MakeOrContinueClaim.p3: For a Tax Credits claim, call 0345 300 3900 (textphone: 0345 300 3909).

LiveInNorthernIreland.h4: If you live in Northern Ireland
LiveInNorthernIreland.p1: To make or continue a claim in Northern Ireland, call:
LiveInNorthernIreland.li1: 0800 022 4250 for Income Support or Jobseeker's Allowance (JSA)
LiveInNorthernIreland.p2: Contact the Northern Ireland Housing Executive to make or continue a Housing Benefit claim.
